Truth: What is the most embarrassing thing that has ever happened to you?
Have you ever lied to your best friend? What was it about?
Dare: Do a dance in the middle of the room.
Eat a spoonful of hot sauce.
Text your crush and tell them how you feel.

Truth: Have you ever cheated on a test or exam? What was the result?
Have you ever stolen something? What was it?
Have you ever cheated on a significant other? What happened?
Dare: Call your best friend and speak in a different accent for the entire conversation.

Truth: What is your biggest pet peeve?
Dare: Send a text message to a family member saying that you're dropping out of school (but make sure to tell them it's just a dare afterwards).

Truth: Have you ever told a secret that you promised to keep?
Dare: Go outside and do the chicken dance for 30 seconds.

Truth: What is the most embarrassing thing in your search history?
Dare: Eat a spoonful of peanut butter without drinking anything for 30 seconds.
